com.bluecreation.melodysmart

Class ImageManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bluecreation.melodysmart.ImageManager

  • public class ImageManager
extends java.lang.Object
    ImageManager provides the functionality to list and download the official MelodySmart OTAU images as well as to prepare a raw image with the correct bluetooth address and XtalTrim parameters before it is downloaded to a remote device

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ImageManager() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void downloadList()
      Starts downloading the list of available MelodySmart images.
      java.lang.String getBaseURL()
      Retrieves the base URL where MelodySmart images are published
      java.lang.String getManifestFileName()
      Retrieves the filename relative to getBaseURL() of the Manifest file where the list of available MelodySmart OTAU images is published.
      void registerListener(ImageManagerListener listener)
      Registers a listener that will be reported about events regarding downloading MelodySmart OTAU images.
      void unregisterListener(ImageManagerListener listener)
      Unregisters a listener that will no longer be reported about events regarding downloading MelodySmart OTAU images.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ImageManager

        public ImageManager()

    • Method Detail

      • registerListener

        public void registerListener(ImageManagerListener listener)
        Registers a listener that will be reported about events regarding downloading MelodySmart OTAU images.
        Parameters:
        listener - If null or already registered, nothing happens

      • unregisterListener

        public void unregisterListener(ImageManagerListener listener)
        Unregisters a listener that will no longer be reported about events regarding downloading MelodySmart OTAU images.
        Parameters:
        listener - If null or not registered previously, nothing happens

      • getBaseURL

        public java.lang.String getBaseURL()
        Retrieves the base URL where MelodySmart images are published
        Returns:
        The base URL.

      • getManifestFileName

        public java.lang.String getManifestFileName()
        Retrieves the filename relative to getBaseURL() of the Manifest file where the list of available MelodySmart OTAU images is published.
        Returns:
        The Manifest filename.

      • downloadList

        public void downloadList()
        Starts downloading the list of available MelodySmart images. When finished, ImageManagerListener.onListDownloaded(java.util.List) is reported.
